price: ننوځئ د جهنم دروازو ته، تلپاتې په هغه كې، هغه د كبرجنو ناكاره هستوګنځى دى.
arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
